Description: 
-------------------- 
We all remember the landing of the space planet brave infantry in the game of Section 8! The Adventures of the brave men of the arrival was not the end, who had followed the game of Section 8: Prejudice! now is not only a networking platform for the mass murder - in front of us was a quality game that has developed a unique company with a good story. Network mode is prettier, has added new modes and weapons. a few words about the image: the developers set the old motor and the war of the future is really alive: explosions of color, flying beyond the body of the explosion of party pleasing to the eyes. The special effects have grown at least in the head - and that the explosions are more realistic and colorful. The weapons in the arsenal also increased, which can not but welcome. The success of a new set of Section 8: Prejudice - time will tell, but to familiarize with the new product is unique!
